snippet.title: Deck of Souls — Release Date Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Deck of Souls Now - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2088770/Deck_of_Souls/

Deck of Souls, a rough deck-building roguelike inspired by the Souls-series, will be available on Steam on June 20!
